website_summaries.verdict: This sleek device produces ultrasonic cool mist to help with dry skin.
pros: Cacagoo’s car diffuser is quiet and subtly designed
Cool ultrasonic mist is safe and may help ease coughing and congestion due to colds
Can spray for up to 20 hours in intermittent mode
Equips a built-in water sensor, 7 LED light colors, and automatic shutoff
cons: Does not support essential oils or aromas, as those can damage the unit

customer_reviews.title: This is not a DIFFUSER it's a HUMIDIFIER!
customer_reviews.text: This is not a diffuser! I now see this as I've read several more reviews! I have used this several times within the last few days and now it has completely stopped working! The only thing it does is light up! I don't need a car night light or a humidifier lol! Very unhappy with this purchase and the false description given.
customer_reviews.author: Deszarae S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice for Car or Home
customer_reviews.text: Since this little dealio plugs into a usb for power, you can easily use it at home or in the car, or even at work. Side note, and my only caution to a buyer on buying items like this... ~~If you are going to use it in the car in a closed environment, you DO NOT need a lot of the oil or extract. Definitely not as much as you would at home. You can easily smoke or smell yourself right out of the car. Great little item, and we will be getting more for gifts this Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: A.J williams

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't give you nothing again too make
customer_reviews.text: It's terrible engineering I just got it worked for less than week and stopped working this second one I get and its always something wrong with it's performance it just stops working
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did not believe the reviewers
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working in 2 weeks. I used it in my commute (2 hrs) 3 x a week. After 2 weeks of using it only in the car, it stopped working. Does not even turn on. I am disappointed. Suppose you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: S. Kim

customer_reviews.title: Works well, lasts a long time
customer_reviews.text: This diffused plugs into a USB port. You have the option of continuous mist or intermittent mist. The amount of scent is adjustable by how much essential oil you add to the water. A full container lasts around 8 hrs so I don’t have to fill it up often. You can store a water bottle of mixed water in your car for frequent refills if you drive a lot. The scent of Lavender is very relaxing while I drive, my kids and I really enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: NOT A DIFFUSER
customer_reviews.text: This is only a humidifier. Not a diffuser. I bought this because I needed a second car diffuser and didn't read the reviews beforehand. I am hoping that others don't make the mistake I and I'm sure, others have made.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Works most of the time
customer_reviews.text: This humidifier is surprisingly quiet. Most humidifiers that advertise "whisper quiet" still have a bit of a hum to them. This one tends to clog and sputter every so often. So far it hasn't required any intervention to get it to work again; it just sort of gurgles then spews, then back to business as usual.
customer_reviews.author: Fox

customer_reviews.title: Dosn't last even with at full
customer_reviews.text: At full water fill, I can't get it to last longer than about 4 hours. I tried the incremental setting and it lasted about 6 hours. The unit is very portable but I wish it lasted longer when used. Plus, I'm not sure how to get replacement filter. It does come with one but what will I do after that's gone?
customer_reviews.author: BennyC.

customer_reviews.title: Portable and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this humidifier for my youngest daughters room as she tends to have allergy issues. The product is easy to use and works exactly what I needed it for. Its easy to clean and my daughter loves the fact of the color changing lights so it really is a 2 for one deal for me. Great price and also does the job!
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Small and portable
customer_reviews.text: I put it in the car and desk. It is good because it can be changed by usb. Specially when you have baby, you need to drive him everywhere. Heater in the car will dry air during winter. Car Humidifier is necessary. This one won’t leak! I also use it in bedroom and library, small space. It is small and portable.
customer_reviews.author: Yujin Zhou

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Only have had this product for a couple of days so I will try to update later on. I have used it several times in the past couple of days in my car. Easy to install and has the usb part on the top making it easy to plug in and have in the cup holder. It has several settings which I like. Changes colors, you can use with or without the colors. There’s also the option to have it on auto and only diffuse every couple of seconds. I am using oils in it (very little) for smell & it hasn’t had any issues yet.
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!  You will love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this!! Used at hospital when I delivered my child!! The nurses loved coming to my room because of how great it smelled!! I lost my silicone ring there tho and so now it leaks. Is it possible to get another ring so that I can still use it!! I love it and definitely recommend this for personal use or as a gift. All the nurses and staff wanted one after seeing mine!!
customer_reviews.author: Leah Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely the best!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST portable diffuser I've ever used! This is probably the 10th or 11th one I've purchased and they seem to fail after a few months or less... Not this one, it works just as good as it did on the first day. I just decided to bye another one to use in my craft room, I use the other one in my car. I've seen reviews where they say you're not supposed to put essential oil in it? I've been putting eucalyptus oil in it from the beginning and like I said it works perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: llpc

customer_reviews.title: Water droplets get stuck
customer_reviews.text: Works okay but hard to turn on at times. Also, water droplets get stuck in the little opening on the top and then it doesn't work right and makes a noise until you clear it. Does a good job when working correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta S

customer_reviews.title: love this!
customer_reviews.text: I have one in my house and always wanted the same smells in my car. Now that we are headed across the country to California over spring break with four boys I think we'll get through it happier with less FUNK in the van =) #FromSeaToShiningSea
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Ashton

customer_reviews.title: HONEST REVIEW ITEM NOT RELIABLE
customer_reviews.text: Honest review. Product Stopped working after a month. I cleaned the product as instructed. When it was working, it was great. Unfortunately, I don’t need to waste my money or time doing any extra effort to have the product work as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin De Gaviria

customer_reviews.title: Car diffuser
customer_reviews.text: Love this diffuser. The only downfall is that the gasket/seal that goes on the top piece falls out every time I open the diffuser to add water and oils. Other than that, I love this product and continue to use it daily.
customer_reviews.author: Brett T.

customer_reviews.title: I’m impressed
customer_reviews.text: We moved from Cali to Texas in our minivan.. this helped as our nose gets dry from the ac or heater. Also helped my daughter w her motion sickness for some reason she didn’t puke at all during the 3 day trip.
customer_reviews.author: Nori

customer_reviews.title: Really enjoying this diffuser
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this diffuser for my desk at work. I get migraines so hoping that essential oils will help with this. It is really easy to use. Love the color changes and it has been very surprising that it doesn't go through water very fast. I've gotten a lot of compliments on it once everyone figured out what it was.
customer_reviews.author: Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: My son and I often struggle with our allergies and bad air quality here in the central valley the air is so dry. I wanted to have a small humidifier in my car for when we travel and just to drive around town to make it easier for us to breath lol I noticed the difference right away! I'm very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: karina

customer_reviews.title: Easy Come, Easy Go
customer_reviews.text: Mine worked wonderfully for 10 months and then it just gave up. I kept it clean, used only tap water and no oils, so not sure why it died. It was perfect for use in my office on my desk because it tends to get very dry in here.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: No does not work for longer than a week! :(
customer_reviews.text: Loved this diffuser for the first week of using it. I thought it was amazing quality, but after 7-10 days the light only turns on and won’t diffuse anything. Guessing mine is defective. So disappointed. Not even worth it to ship it back for a refund because the cost to ship back is more than half of what the diffuser cost. Would just love a working car diffuser. Any ideas?
customer_reviews.author: Billy S.

customer_reviews.title: Wait for it...
customer_reviews.text: Allow for the cotton insert to get fully emerged and sit for a while before testing the mist function. It is very strong, my kids thought there was a fire in the car lol
customer_reviews.author: MidwestMom

customer_reviews.title: One drive to work later & stop working
customer_reviews.text: One day and it stop working after one day of used, and that’s just in the drive to work and now it just barely anything comes out.
customer_reviews.author: Dlance

customer_reviews.title: Works a treat
customer_reviews.text: Works a treat. I have travel anxiety and it's fantastic for the journey. enough to last for at least 2/3 hrs. really compact and the USB plugs are great. Really pleased
customer_reviews.author: Prem

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking humidifier
customer_reviews.text: My husband is a truck driver and we order it for him, keeps him healthy breading at work , works pervert and have a good price, feet perfect in a cup holder and have really noce lights
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana

customer_reviews.title: Does what it's intended to do
customer_reviews.text: This little machine will add slight humidity to a small area like your car, cubicle, or next to your bed. I have it on my nightstand and I enjoy the slight noise it makes as white noise when I go to bed. The different colored lights are also a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Super nice
customer_reviews.text: An amazing product, runs for hours between refills. The products super easy to use one push for continuous use pressed again for spurts. The colors slowly transition and you can set it to display a single color. Over all I’m more than impressed with this.
customer_reviews.author: Dontai Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to fill, compact and perfect for travel
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for my road trip. My skin stayed hydrated while I drove. It's compact, easy to fill and fur in my cup holder. Great item!
customer_reviews.author: Lorelei Brown

customer_reviews.title: Charmingly misty
customer_reviews.text: Small diffuser is great for so many uses. I sometimes use it in the car to aid some fresh misty air. Other times I put it on my desk at work to help hydrate the stuffiness. The color changing is charming and gives great ambiance to my desk.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi Reilly

customer_reviews.title: Travel necessity
customer_reviews.text: I have never used a diffuser in the car but this little thing is perfect! I even took it in while traveling. The water lasts a few days and I love the color changing. It fits perfectly into my cupholder
customer_reviews.author: Chad Fuller

customer_reviews.title: broke after 2 month use..
customer_reviews.text: i purchase 2 of these CACAGOO Car Diffuser Cool Mist Air Car Humidifier 2 months ago, now down to one, one of them did not want to work, not happy that they dont last that long...
customer_reviews.author: Dat B.

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work for me. The company was very responsive and did replace the original purchase. Unfortunately the second one didn't work either
customer_reviews.author: Talisha

customer_reviews.title: Not ordering again.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't emit as much as the picture shows and smells are not as much as I would like to be able to smell.
customer_reviews.author: c.cruz

customer_reviews.title: False advertising
customer_reviews.text: Not a diffuser it's a humidifier. Mine also does not light up either and it isn't wireless
customer_reviews.author: Elsa Nelia Rodriguez-Ortega

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly and is stress-free!
customer_reviews.text: Easy Peasy, compact & is super quiet! No heavy wells to clean fill and carry.
customer_reviews.author: Enola

customer_reviews.title: It breaks after a month
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this product at first, but then it broke! I had it for a month, and it was working great until today, and the return window closed yesterday, so that’s really inconvenient.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great, until it breaks for no reason...twice
customer_reviews.text: Received a new product after returning the first one. The second diffuser broke AGAIN. Do not purchase this item if you’re looking to replace it on a monthly basis.... First purchase: I used it for less than 2 hours. Was great at first, but now the unit will not diffuse. The lights come on, but that’s it :-(
customer_reviews.author: Ashley J. Wysocki

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect. Don’t EVER lose the spring! And get filters. If using in your car and leaving it in there it will start to smell.
customer_reviews.author: dazdnconfzd2

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine for a month. No longer works. Fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia Angela

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last long :(
customer_reviews.text: Diffused once in my truck and the next day it stopped working. Super sad, I used it last week for the first time. The power button won’t even work.
customer_reviews.author: Tia Jennings

customer_reviews.title: Awesome !!!
customer_reviews.text: This little bugger is a beast !!! I have it in my semi to beat the dry heat and just LOVE it !!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon shop-a-holic

customer_reviews.title: Not for use with EO or fragrance oils
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY FOR USE WITH OILS!!! Everything else is ok with it. I don’t need a humidifier I live in extreme South Georgia where the humidity is so thick you can barely breathe!! Wasted my money! EDIT **Was able to return for a full refund. So my money was not wasted! **
customer_reviews.author: Neesie

customer_reviews.title: Small but powerful
customer_reviews.text: I liked that it was easy to use, clean, and put together.
customer_reviews.author: Lorena

customer_reviews.title: Messy, leaked water when in use.
customer_reviews.text: It had a good run time, but it seem to create as much moisture on the surface of the machine as it is putting in the air. I had to put a coaster underneath to collect the water running down the sides.
customer_reviews.author: BIDAURRETA

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: Does it job. Keeps me humidified in my car. Love the changing light, too.
customer_reviews.author: Audacious

customer_reviews.title: Not a diffuser
customer_reviews.text: It's not actually a diffuser! I was so disappointed. It's useless. No one need a humidifier in their car. We have a defroster just to keep humidity out of the car! This serves little to no purpose that I can think of.
customer_reviews.author: Volo

customer_reviews.title: My driving  experience  has changed
customer_reviews.text: My second time buying this diffuser, it almost fits a whole bottle of water , up to 3 hours I will say it works , easy to clean, easy to use , I love the changing colors , my rides are relaxing and calm with this diffuser
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: not for essential oils
customer_reviews.text: This is a very powerful little diffuser. I’m a little disappointed because I thought that it was an essential oil diffuser and it’s a mini humidifier. It says not to put essential oils in it. Buttttt I did and it’s working great so far.
customer_reviews.author: heather

customer_reviews.title: Defective product?
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to use this for the car since my allergies are extremely bad, the light never worked for me and the humidifier also builds up a lot of excess water and then won’t dispense since it gets stuck about a minute after working, very disappointed. :(
customer_reviews.author: Megan e

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a week
customer_reviews.text: Like many others have noticed, this failed within a week or two of using. It could be because I used oils in it, but I don’t know. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Not a diffuser.
customer_reviews.text: As EO diffuser doesn't work This thing has a filter. But. As humidifier works ok. The thing is it blows water (little bit) and my cup holder is full of water.
customer_reviews.author: Genny

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Holds a decent amount of water so it lasts a long time! Fit's perfect in the cup holder and even lights up. Well worth the money! has a usb cord so it makes it portable!
customer_reviews.author: S. P. Valentino

customer_reviews.title: Great for the travler
customer_reviews.text: This really puts out a lot of mist..perfect for the winter months!
customer_reviews.author: tlh123

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and well made for the money
customer_reviews.text: Used in Truck truck for long hauling it works well and was delivered promptly
customer_reviews.author: eve

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful for better breathing.
customer_reviews.text: We added drop of eucalyptus oil at water... helps for better breathing.
customer_reviews.author: Yelena

customer_reviews.title: good product but doesn't last long
customer_reviews.text: i got this air refresher in mid April this year and had been used it during my commute. I liked the product but for some reason the mist doesn't work unless i turn upside down. I even tried to change the filter but didn't seem work.
customer_reviews.author: KUEI-YING WANG

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second car humidifier I’ve purchased as I bought a different brand last month and it didn’t work well. However, this Cacagoo brand works perfectly!! Lots of cool mist comes out in a steady stream and helps me to enjoy some humidity in the dry Las Vegas climate. Definitely recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Erikazzz

customer_reviews.title: Diffuse in your car
customer_reviews.text: I love it. In my cup holder last several days.
customer_reviews.author: Stacie Mullins

customer_reviews.title: Good choice
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly for over a month now, looks very nice, very quiet (noise level similar to slightly heavier breathing) and easy to use. Probably the best choice under $30 and a no-brainer for $15 with a coupon
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: I need a replacement or money back.
customer_reviews.text: It only worked for a couple of weeks. I’m not happy. I was so excited about this product. It’s not working at all. I wanted to see if I could find something to help me fix it or I wantned it replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good air flow that provides moisture in small area
customer_reviews.text: Tested it and seem work well. Will see how long it last. Can’t wait to bring it with me on the plane for my next long overseas flight,
customer_reviews.author: Garcia.Jo

customer_reviews.title: Love to buy again
customer_reviews.text: Great cool mist humidifier although i dropped it a few days ago I can say Ill be careful with my new one
customer_reviews.author: Mevis

customer_reviews.title: Does not work as essential oil diffuser
customer_reviews.text: I bought it thinking it was going to work as an essential oil diffuser, but NO! Unfortunately, I missed the window to return it!
customer_reviews.author: Simone Modolo

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a month!!!! LOW QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after a month. When I turn it on my car is getting a burn smell. Not sure how to return now :(
customer_reviews.author: Naveena

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: Love it, just wish it didn’t have to be plugged in the entire time to work. Otherwise, great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this product’
customer_reviews.text: Amazing and perfect for small diffuser in the home or on the go in the car! I enjoyed this for a recent road trip and he last the whole drive! Love the different options and the colors are awesome. Highly recommend this product!!
customer_reviews.author: EMILY D

customer_reviews.title: Too much moisture
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what is the issue, I used it one night going to bed. While in continuous spray mode, the next day (Morning) I find a puddle of water on my night stand. Not sure if the unit have a problem?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Works wonderful in my car and fits perfectly in the cup holder. Love the smell of fresh lemon while I drive.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Nelson

customer_reviews.title: 2 months and already broken
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t even had it for 2 months and already it stopped working!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen H

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I am bummed that the plastic piece when you open stretched out and is too big to put back in nicely but other wise love it
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: No longer works
customer_reviews.text: After few weeks is done , gone, no longer working....
customer_reviews.author: Alex NIko

customer_reviews.title: Upset
customer_reviews.text: Only have had it a month and it just stopped working
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Easy to display
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful lights on when operated. Make the car air more moisture and breath
customer_reviews.author: Kuei

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I loved it at first. It stopped working after a couple of weeks. Super disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after only a week of use. Don’t wast your money.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Kirby

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work well
customer_reviews.text: I was never able to actually get it to work. The light turned on but nothing ever came out.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Stink
customer_reviews.text: After a few days of use, it starts to stink. It's the same after changing the cotton core.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Convenience air purifier but not reliable
customer_reviews.text: It spoilt after 3months though it convenience but its no reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Gkiwi

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product good for everyone
customer_reviews.text: I got 13 of my Instagram followers to get it that’s how good it is
customer_reviews.author: Yiddi ungar

customer_reviews.title: Great Diffuser!
customer_reviews.text: I love this diffuser! It is super easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Schnars

customer_reviews.title: MISLEADING PRODUCT. NOT FOR USE WITH ESSENTI OILS.
customer_reviews.text: This product is sold as an essential oil diffuser, but the box only says "mini humidifier," and the instruction expressly prohibit the use of essential oils with the product. MISLEADING!!!! It also does not produce any visible mist.
customer_reviews.author: nicolem. erny

customer_reviews.title: The item is not working at all
customer_reviews.text: When I first brought the item, I was so exciting for open the box, then when I plug into the electronic with the usb connector, after I add the water inside the item, there is no smoke or the smile of the item. Because I was so busy during Christmas 2019 and Jan and Feb 2020, I did not write the review or return the item. Would I buy this item from the seller again, probably never. I would have to say, this is a lost for nothing for any amount. Not worth to buy, worst than anything I brought from China. Bad product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What an amazing quality in a small package!
customer_reviews.text: I love diffusing essential oils, every day I’m Diffusing something in my home or at work. Now I have the luxury of taking this diffuser on my 30 minute drive to work, I’ll use different oils for different reasons and to wake up and enjoy the ride. I diffuse an allergy synergy blend at the moment since allergies are bad in va right now, some mornings I diffuse a rise and shine blend. At work I also diffuse :) I love that I can take it everywhere. Sooo happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small spaces! Like the car, or your desk!
customer_reviews.text: My wife has wanted one these small "car" humidifiers for some time. This fits perfectly in the cup holder of a Honda CR-V. USB power cable is included. Ultrasonic operation means that you will enjoy the moisturizing vapor immediately after pressing the on button. The color changing is pleasant to watch and this unit will work at your desk at home...or at work.
customer_reviews.author: Ron C

customer_reviews.title: Works Great As Advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box I knew this was going to be a great little product. This is lightweight and small but runs 20 hours on intermittent speed. Will automatically shut itself off when water gets low. This is not a diffuser so don’t go putting oils into it. Do not fill the water up past the fill line or else it won’t work. Great product for the price. Would give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Giveaway Gator

customer_reviews.title: IT BROKE IN FEW DAYS
customer_reviews.text: I was pretty happy until the item stopped working all of a sudden within 5 days. The lights kept going on but the diffuser stop misting all together. I wanted to give it a 2nd try and was ready to buy a 2nd but the price had doubled in those 5 days from $16.99 to $34. Oh well it is really not meant for me. On my way to buy another one
customer_reviews.author: Vizibara

customer_reviews.title: Love it for my vehicle
customer_reviews.text: I love humidifiers. I purchased this one for my vehicle. It easily connects to the USB making it very easy to use. I love how it smells in my car even with my air fresheners. I like using it at night when I'm driving as it changes colors and looks really nice at night. This one is well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: AvidAmazonShopper

customer_reviews.title: Eh.
customer_reviews.text: The size is great and the color changing feature is cool. But the first time I used it I had water it in for 3-4 hours while I ran some errands and it started to smell like mildew. My entire car (brand new) smelled like it had moisture and then I realized that it was coming from the diffuser.
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: Streaming timing
customer_reviews.text: They need to fix under product feature...20 hours using intermittent and 10 hours continuous...this is not correct...that is why I bought it....If you go further down the directions are 10 hours intermittent and 6 hours continuous....not happy that I did not see this.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl Wildgust

customer_reviews.title: Great while it worked
customer_reviews.text: This humidifier worked great for about 2 months then it stopped making any mist. The product still lights up but nothing comes out of it. I wish it would have lasted longer.
customer_reviews.author: TYM

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy it
customer_reviews.text: Its get clogged when it has 15mins working... it is a waste of money. Im really pissed off!
customer_reviews.author: Dilson Ferreira

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Humidifier for the car!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! It has helped so much with the dry cold air of winter. The water lasts a while. The efficiency of output is great!
customer_reviews.author: Mikki

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I got this to work twice and now it won’t diffuse at all. I feel like I have wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Started to leak
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty handy for the size but after a weak it started dripping from the top
customer_reviews.author: orlando valencia

customer_reviews.title: Just as expected
customer_reviews.text: Does great in the car, very compact, fits in the drink holder perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Insco

customer_reviews.title: Best investment
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love it!!! It’s just the right size to fit right in my middle console. I’ll definitely be ordering more
customer_reviews.author: sarah hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you have a warranty on it
customer_reviews.text: I would not buy another one because it only works for a couple of months and then stopped and you’re unable to get another one
customer_reviews.author: julius

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't even had this diffuser for 6 month and it already stopped working. I only used about 10 times.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Marin

customer_reviews.title: Quit after 4 hours use
customer_reviews.text: Do not purchase this product. It quit working after just 4 hours of use.
customer_reviews.author: Doug S

product_meta.title: CACAGOO Car Diffuser Cool Mist Air Car Humidifier Air Refresher USB Ultrasonic Diffuser with 7 Colorful LED Lights, Waterless Auto Shut-Off, for Car Travel Office Home (BPA Free)
feature_bullets: [Ultrasonic Cool Mist Humidifier] Oscillate and decompose the water into fine nano-class cool mist molecules, quickly penetrate underlying skin and relieve dry skin.
[Quiet Operation] Quiet operation with a noise level as low as 35dB. Suitable for car, bedrooms, study, office, baby room, etc. Bring good sleep to you and your families.
[Safe & Auto-off] Built-in water level sensor, automatically power off when water level is lower than the safe level.
[Long working time] In intermittent spray mode, up to 20 hours. In continuous spray mode, up to 10 hours.
[7 Colors LED Light] 7 variable colors LED charging light. Press the button for 1.5s to start LED light. Press 1.5s again to lock the color. Press 1.5s again to turn off LED light.
